title: i want register account PBE
body: pls help me going to step 3 create account PBE.today morning 30/09 im max level 30

replies.body: We can't force or expedite a PBE application.  We do have a [PBE faq ](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/page/pbe-faq)that provides some insight on how applications may be accepted, but patience the most important piece.  Best of luck with your admissions to the PBE!
i want going PBE soon 5 last season.this year i want going PBE now im testing  all skin and hextech craft :(
